## useHandleValueChange() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useHandleValueChange(mapList: Record<Value, Value>, dataType?: DataType, onChange?: (mapping: Record<Value, Value>) => void): (key: Value, newValue: Value) => void;
```
